pages.text: > $(n)Health:$() 40  $(br)> $(n)Attack Damage:$() $(br)adult: 3-5 on easy, 3-8 on normal, 4.5-12 on hard $(br)baby: 0.5, 0.75 on hard $(br)> $(n)Behavior:$() Hostile     $(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() When a Hoglin left the Nether  $(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)They are healed by $(thing)Instant Damage$() and harmed by $(thing)Instant Health$() effects, are immune to $(thing)Regeneration$() and $(thing)Poison effects$().
